Mod.name: Mould N
Mod.description:
Mould N
Aims to give incentives and rewards for hunting monsters and bosses.
VERY WIP
Current Features: - 10 new wands to find - 3 new starting wands - 4 perks are now drops from specific enemies or bosses - Changes to 1 boss - Find and use Hiisi weapons
Planned Features: - Boss drops - Boss balancing - Mage Drops
